Title: Authorizes the commissioner of education to withhold apportionment and grants from private schools under certain circumstances
Summary: Authorizes the commissioner of education to withhold apportionment and grants from private schools that do not file a recent fire safety report in a timely manner.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to authorizing the commissioner of education to withhold apportionment and grants from private schools that do not file a recent fire safety report in a timely manner
